sources.title: Vessel of Wrath (1938)
sources.description: Ginger Ted, AKA Edward Claude Wilson, a drunkard and womanizer, and Miss Jones, a missionary, live in the Alas Islands. During a cholera epidemic, Ginger Ted and Miss Jones are sent to an outlying part of the islands to run a hospital; on their return, their motorboat breaks down, and they are marooned overnight on a small island. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/vessel-of-wrath-1938/
